name: Arts and Crafts
description:
play as Sketch, who, after waking up as a singular arm and rebuilding himself, travels through a desolate wasteland to reach an unknown destination through the Recycling Center, while avoiding potential threats such as The Discarded, the shredded up remains of those before you, torn and forgotten. And learn of of the strange properties of Lifepins, pins that, when put into an object, will imbued life into the object. Will you make it out of the Scrapyard alive?

CONTROLS:

A and D: Left and Right

W and space: Jump

ESC: Close menus

Click: Attack

Credits:

Damian (programmer)

John stotler (composer, https://www.johnstotlermusic.com/)
